short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch Randoplan using the Ride with GPS or Strava route on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on this extension when viewing a route page on Ride with GPS, and randoplan will open in another tab with the route loaded, ready to give a forecast when the start time, etc, are selected. This now works with either Ride with GPS or Strava routes.
